original_text: But I had concern for my holy name, which the house of Israel had profaned among the nations to which they came.
korean_text: 그러나 이스라엘 족속이 들어간 그 여러 나라에서 더럽힌 내 거룩한 이름을 내가 아꼈노라

sentences.original_text: But I had concern for my holy name
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 내 거룩한 이름에 관심이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: which the house of Israel had profaned
among the nations to which they came
